metadata.title: CVE-2021-38173 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Btrbk before 0.31.2 allows command execution because of the mishandling of remote hosts filtering SSH commands using ssh_filter_btrbk.sh in authorized_keys.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-38173` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

btrbk - 0.27.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: btrbk package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.1-2').
